ruling: - The first effect of [[The Six Samurai - Kamon]] targets the card to be destroyed.
- If all other "Six Samurai" monsters you controlled were destroyed by an effect chained to [[The Six Samurai - Kamon]]'s effect, [[The Six Samurai - Kamon]]'s effect will not resolve.
- If [[The Six Samurai - Kamon]] declares an attack, then is flipped face-down, then flipped face-up, you cannot use its effect that same turn because it already attacked.
- If [[The Six Samurai - Kamon]]'s effect is used, then [[Skill Drain]] is activated later, [[The Six Samurai - Kamon]] still cannot declare an attack that turn.
- Please see [[The Six Samurai - Irou]] for additional rulings.
